articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The move could prove beneficial for more environmentally-friendly blockchains that use proof-of-stake, such as Ethereum or Solana.
articles.title: Europe Set to Roll Out Energy Efficiency Labels for Blockchains

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: An unknown attacker stole $1 million in Binance Coin (BNB) from BitKeep's Token Swap feature and transferred them to Tornado Cash.
articles.title: BitKeep Hacker Moves $1M in Binance Coin Through Tornado Cash

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Do Kwon got “carried away” and would spend less time on crypto Twitter if he could do things differently, he said in a new interview.
articles.title: Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon Developed Crypto Twitter Persona for 'Entertainment Value'

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Since Aptos' launch yesterday, many took to Twitter to vent about false advertising, lack of transparency, and a huge VC token allocation
articles.title: Crypto Twitter Reacts to Chaotic Aptos Launch, APT Token Distribution

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: Wylie Aronow and Greg Solano said it's "not that surprising" the SEC would look at NFTs, and that having their identities outed was "bound to happen."
articles.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club Founders Talk SEC Investigation and Getting 'Doxxed'

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Bicycle will use its Ethereum NFT artwork to sell decks of Ape-branded cards, with plans to collaborate with other owners.
articles.title: Why 137-Year-Old Brand Bicycle is Making Bored Ape NFT Playing Cards

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Ripple shows no signs of backing down from its commitment to NFT creators building on the XRP Ledger.
articles.title: Ripple Unveils Latest Recipients of $250 Million NFT Creator Fund

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The CFTC and the SEC have followed Singapore regulators in investigating the bankrupt hedge fund Three Arrows Capital.
articles.title: SEC, CFTC Launch Probe Into Bankrupt Crypto Fund Three Arrows Capital: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Walmart’s global chief technology officer Suresh Kumar explained how crypto and the metaverse will play key roles in the future of payments.
articles.title: Cryptocurrencies Will Play ‘Very important Role’ in Payments Disruption: Walmart CTO

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Prominent DeFi tokens, including Maker, Lido, and Curve, have all led the latest crypto rebound, jumping in price.
articles.title: Curve Finance, MakerDAO, and Lido Lead DeFi Token Rally

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The VC-backed Layer 1 solution was built by Meta alums and touts a novel transaction-ordering algorithm.
articles.title: 'Solana Killer' Aptos Launches Its Highly Anticipated Mainnet

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Despite several high-profile hacks, Solana remains a popular rival to the much larger Ethereum.
articles.title: Solana Founder: We're More 'Complementary' to Ethereum Than 'Killer'

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The ConsenSys CEO believes augmented and virtual experiences will redefine daily life, despite current technical challenges.
articles.title: Ethereum Co-Founder Joe Lubin: Today's Metaverse Is Internet Circa 1994, But the Masses Are Coming

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The SEC is investigating Bored Ape Yacht Club creator Yuga Labs for securities violations. Legal experts say it could have a significant impact on the NFT industry.
articles.title: SEC vs BAYC? Here’s What Legal Experts Say It Means for NFTs

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Developers begin to tweak proposals that may be incorporated into Ethereum’s first major post-merge upgrade.
articles.title: Ethereum Launches Testnet to Begin Work on Shanghai Upgrade

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Parler made waves in the crypto space when the right-leaning social network launched Donald Trump NFTs.
articles.title: Kanye West to Buy Crypto-Friendly Social Media Platform Parler

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly,Daniel Roberts
articles.description: While centralized crypto lenders were collapsing, DeFi worked as it should, making it the “end state for markets,” Robert Leshner argues.
articles.title: DeFi 'Should Be the Foundation’ of Every Financial Product: Compound’s Robert Leshner

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: We’re in the upside-down as crypto and traditional markets swap investment roles.
articles.title: Bitcoin Volatility Falls to Two-Year Low as TradFi Markets Wobble

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: RippleX developers are currently testing an Ethereum-compatible sidechain and a bridge that will connect it to the XRP Ledger’s mainnet.
articles.title: Ripple’s XRP Ledger Is Getting a Sidechain That’s Compatible With Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Texas regulators say they're probing FTX, FTX US, and founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried for potential securities violations.
articles.title: FTX, Sam Bankman-Fried Under Investigation by Texas Regulators

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The crypto exchange has yet to explain the move, but it comes at a time when Gemini Europe’s executive leadership is facing major upheaval.
articles.title: Cameron Winklevoss Resigns From Gemini Europe Director Post

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Payments giant Mastercard is teaming up with Paxos to launch crypto trading for banks by taking care of compliance and security.
articles.title: Mastercard Taps Paxos to Launch Crypto Trading for Banks

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: By trading below $1 for a prolonged period, Houston-based Bitcoin miner Digihost violated Nasdaq’s listing compliance.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Digihost Risks Nasdaq Delisting as Stock Plunges 84% This Year

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: North Korean cyber crime group Lazarus has been aggressively targeting Japanese crypto companies through phishing and social engineering attacks.
articles.title: North Korea’s Lazarus Group Attacks Japanese Crypto Firms

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Investment bank Société Générale has gained approval to operate digital asset services in France, in its latest crypto-focused efforts.
articles.title: Société Générale’s Crypto Division Lands Regulatory Approval in France

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: ASIC blocked client access to three different crypto funds, alleging Holon hadn’t properly considered its target markets.
articles.title: Australian Regulator Cracks Down on Firm's Bitcoin, Ethereum, Filecoin Funds

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The price of Huobi’s native token has skyrocketed over the past seven days as Justin Sun reportedly becomes one of the largest holders.
articles.title: Huobi Token Moons 79% on The Week as Justin Sun Becomes Exchange Advisor

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Coinbase CEO Armstrong will funnel about $54 million to projects aiming to extend human life and reward academic research via crypto.
articles.title: Coinbase CEO to Sell 2% of COIN Stock to Fund Life Extension, Scientific Research

articles.author: Daniel Roberts
articles.description: To gauge crypto's future viability, look beyond the current market misery to major signs of adoption from BlackRock, BNY Mellon, and Google.
articles.title: Pay No Attention to the Price of Bitcoin and Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Solana’s top NFT marketplace no longer forces traders to pay creator royalties after rival upstarts cut into its market share.
articles.title: Magic Eden Flip-Flops on Solana NFT Royalties, Making Them Optional

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The iconic rapper taps Astro Project to make music video assets available to fans.
articles.title: Snoop Dogg Video Collab Combines ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ With Web3

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: There were also unsettling reports of harassment at an Ethereum Foundation developer conference.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: $100 Million Mango Markets Saga, Caitlin Long Calls Out Fed

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: High inflation readings from the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics have turned investors off of crypto for the moment.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Google Cloud, BNY Mellon News Doesn't Boost Bitcoin, Ethereum

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Apple’s mixed reality headset is reportedly on the horizon, but will its immersive vision tie into the Web3 metaverse?
articles.title: Apple and the Metaverse: Everything We Know So Far

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The billionaire FTX CEO now says he'll be pausing his political spending until further notice.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says He Won’t Spend $1B on Political Races—Despite 'Dumb Quote'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Nayib Bukele has one of the highest approval ratings among leaders in Latin America, a new survey shows.
articles.title: El Salvador’s Bukele Remains Popular Despite Bad Bitcoin Bets, Slumping Economy

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The hacker stole over $100 million in crypto from the Mango Markets Exchange on Tuesday, and may get to keep almost half of it.
articles.title: Mango DAO Offers Hacker $47M to Settle Without Pressing Charges

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The fox is getting an upgrade thanks to one stinky fish.
articles.title: Ethereum Wallet MetaMask Adds Instant Bank-to-Crypto Transfers

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Crypto exchange Bitfinex said it's "pleased" with the judge's decision to remove Roche Freedman from the lawsuit alleged it committed fraud.
articles.title: Bitfinex 'Pleased' With Law Firm Roche Freedman's Removal From Class Action

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin-centric startup ZEBEDEE announced a new initiative that contributes open source code and products to the Lightning Network space.
articles.title: No Big Deal: ZEBEDEE Contributes to Bitcoin Lightning Network Open Source Development

articles.description: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.
articles.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap

articles.description: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.
articles.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'

articles.description: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko

articles.description: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.
articles.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.
articles.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment

articles.description: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.
articles.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now

articles.description: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.
articles.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do

articles.description: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.
articles.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk

articles.description: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."
articles.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs

articles.description: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.
articles.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022

articles.description: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.
articles.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2

articles.description: Regulation and policy is going to be the factor that most meaningfully shapes the crypto industry in the next few years. On a panel at Messari Mainnet 2022, Coinbase US policy chief Kara Calvert, Haun Ventures chief policy officer Tomicah Tillemann, and Crypto Council for Innovation CEO Sheila Warren gazed into the policy crystal ball with Decrypt's Dan Roberts.
articles.title: Crypto Policy Crystal Ball: Coinbase, Haun Ventures, and Crypto Council for Innovation at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Near Protocol founder Illia Polosukhin joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about what's being built on Near's blockchain, real-life use cases for DeFi including Sweatcoin, and how crypto continues to help Ukraine, where Polosukhin is from.
articles.title: Why NEAR Founder Illia Polosukhin Is Bullish on Sweatcoin and Other Social Dapps

articles.description: Santiago Sabater, founder of DeFi Chain Accelerator, joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about how DeFi Chain supports smart contracts on a proof-of-stake fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.
articles.title: How DeFi Chain Is 'Bringing DeFi Back to Bitcoin': DeFi Chain Accelerator Founder

articles.description: Gitcoin's fundraising and partnerships lead Azeem Khan tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how Gitcoin grants work, the importance of community voting, and continuing to give out grants even through the bear market.
articles.title: How Gitcoin Has Given Millions of Dollars in Crypto to Worthy Projects: Azeem Khan at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to give his views on regulation and the SEC, how DeFi projects will split between compliant and non-compliant and that it's "ideologically confusing" but "not necessarily a bad thing."
articles.title: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick: Regulation Will Fork DeFi Projects Into Two Camps

articles.description: Christine Moy of Apollo Global, formerly of JPMorgan, and David Mercer of LMAX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts onstage at SALT NY for a talk on institutional crypto investing and what hurdles remain to broader adoption amid the crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bringing Institutions to Crypto: Christine Moy of Apollo, David Mercer of LMAX at SALT NY

articles.description: Brian Trunzo, metaverse lead at Polygon Studios, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 why he's bullish on metaverse fashion, how big brands are thinking about it, why the future of NFTs will be in gaming and not "right-click save JPEGs," and why he doesn't think the visual graphics of the metaverse need to dramatically improve necessarily.
articles.title: Polygon Studios Metaverse Lead: JPEGs Are 'Not the Future of Web3 and NFTs'

articles.description: Balcony DAO co-founder John Belitsky tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 how Balcony DAO is fractionalizing real estate investment using NFTs starting with 20 Third Avenue in Long Branch, NJ, and why it's waiting to launch its token as a registered security with the SEC.
articles.title: Balcony DAO Is Fractionalizing Investment in a New Jersey Building as an NFT
